author: Brodie Robertson
description:
2 years back the EU passed a directive forcing USB C to be the standard port for device charging, and a few days ago that has now come into effect except for laptops which come on a bit later, in my opinion, this is a great change.

title: USB C Is Officially The Universal Charging Port
